WelcomePage.Title: Internet Resources
WelcomePage.Text: The Internet is a wonderful place, especially for Agents. This article serves as a list of jumping-off places for where you can find the best Internet sites.
WelcomePage.Heading: News Sources
WelcomePage.Text: * [yellow]MHT[/] ([blue underline]mht.com[/]) - An excellent place to find the latest computer-related news
* [yellow]NerdNet[/] ([blue underline]nerd.net[/]) - The forum to replace all forums
WelcomePage.Heading: Hacking Guides
WelcomePage.Text: * [yellow]Goph's Guide[/] ([blue underline]goph.org[/]) - A more generic resource about all things hacking
* [yellow]ReHack Wiki[/] ([blue underline]wiki.rehack.org[/]) - The best place for info on ReHack and you
